variable.name: referenceDirectory
variable.description: Directory where one can find the real proteins

variable.name: outputDirectoryStructures
variable.description: Directory where to store the intermediate structures

variable.name: outputDirectoryMovers
variable.description: Directory where to store the intermediate movers

variable.name: numIterations
variable.description: Maximum number of iterations performed by the defolder

variable.name: maxPairs
variable.description: Maximum number of pairs generated for a protein

variable.name: averageIncrease
variable.description: Average increase needed to accept a new structure
